attributes.additional_details:
I want the gov't to stop millions of us suffering and dying early from Dementias,Type 2 Diabetes,Cancers and the other inflammatory illnesses.
The CURE needs to be introduced into the NHS.
It costs about £2/day and is painless and natural.
A few teaspoons per day of high purity marine omega 3's improves the patient's blood resulting in these remarkable outcomes.
The same technique will even effect 100% recovery from traumatic injury such as the present comatose state of Michael Schumacher.
Let's do it.
